### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Coal mine at position(x=43.5, y=-82.5)
Consists of following entities
- Burner mining drill (position x=43.0, y=-84.0) and a furnace at position(x=45.0, y=-83.0)
- Furnace (position x=40.0, y=-82.0) 
- Furnace (position x=42.0, y=-81.0)
- Furnace (position x=45.0, y=-80.0)
- Furnace (position x=40.0, y=-79.0)
### Iron ore mine at position(x=-16.5, y=-49.5)
Consists of following entities
- Burner mining drill (position x=-15.0, y=-50.0)
### Electricity generator at position(x=10.5, y=10.5)
Consists of steam engine (position x=10.5, y=10.5), boiler (position x=-6.0, y=24.5) and offshore pump (position x=-9.5, y=24.5)
### Lab at unknown position
Consists of lab with input {'automation-science-pack': 67}
### Pipe network at position(x=-9.5, y=23.5)
Consists of pipe group with fluid system 46026 and multiple pipes
### Pipe network at position(x=10.5, y=13.5)
Consists of pipe group with fluid system 46022 and multiple pipes
### Electricity network at position(x=2.5, y=2.5)
Consists of small electric poles at positions (x=2.5,y=2.5),(x=4.5,y=5.5),(x=8.5,y=9.5),(x=2.5,y=1.5)

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when inspecting inventory of offshore pump
- Ensure that the offshore pump has an inventory to inspect before attempting to inspect it
### Errors when using burner mining drill with full chest
- Make sure to empty the chest at the drop position before continuing to mine
### Errors when using furnace with no ingredients to smelt
- Ensure that the furnace has the required ingredients to smelt before starting the smelting process
### Errors when using boiler with no fuel
- Ensure that the boiler has fuel before attempting to use it
### Errors when using steam engine with no input liquid
- Ensure that the steam engine has an input liquid before attempting to use it
### Errors when using pipe group with no fluid present in connections
- Ensure that the pipe group has a fluid present in the connections before attempting to use it
